title: I WANT MY PLAT BACK! >:| Need decent duo.
body:
Need a duo that could help me get back into plat, A jungler would be best as i main mid.
This is not a post about asking for a free carry nor anything of the matter i would simply like a junlger that has a brain in his head and can play this game at a gold 1 - plat 3 elo. 
Would really like it if we could Teamspeak. 
I will not get mad at you if you do bad for one game or even 2 games i expect the same back, No one can all ways do there best, anyone I've added and started playing with being a dick will be removed from my ts sever and blocked, I'm here to have fun :).

Add Me, IGN: Kitty Katt.

replies.body:
My IGN: Arrabbiata

Platinum 4, I am flexible in my roles but most comfortable in the jungle. I main Elise, Lee sin and Pantheon. I posted a discussion on the recruitment page recently about ranked teams and requirements etc. But essentially, I am looking for a non salty and non flaming person that knows what they are doing. I use discord and skype only though.

Would like to play a few games with you to get a feel ^_^ add me if interested
Oh and I forgot to add, I am on everyday~
I will carry you to bronze 2 but that is as far as our journey will take us.
Still looking for someone to duo with, Found 2 people but they get one once a week.....
